scripts.assets: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console assets:install public --symlink --relative
scripts.bash:phpfpm: docker exec -ti $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bash
scripts.cmd:install:all: npm-run-all -c exec doctrine:migrate assets encore:dev lint:all
scripts.composer:fund: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer fund
scripts.composer:install: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer install
scripts.composer:install:dev: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer install --no-progress --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader
scripts.composer:install:prod: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer install --no-progress --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader --no-dev
scripts.composer:outdated: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer outdated
scripts.composer:suggests: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer suggests --by-suggestion
scripts.composer:update: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer update
scripts.composer:validate: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer validate
scripts.doctrine:fixtures: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console doctrine:fixtures:load -n
scripts.doctrine:migrate: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console doctrine:migrations:migrate -n
scripts.doctrine:schema:update: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console doctrine:schema:update --force
scripts.doctrine:validate: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console doctrine:schema:validate
scripts.exec: npm-run-all -c bdd:mariadb docker:getpull-image docker:deploy docker:waiting docker:ls
scripts.labstag:geocode:install: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console labstag:geocode:install
scripts.labstag:guard-route: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console labstag:guard-route
scripts.labstag:install: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console labstag:install
scripts.labstag:workflows-show: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console labstag:workflows-show
scripts.lint:all: npm-run-all -c cmd:validate_outdated cmd:php-cs-fixer_phpcbf eslint:fix lint:stylelint:fix lint:twig lint:container lint:yaml lint:phpaudit lint:markdown rector
scripts.lint:container: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console lint:container
scripts.lint:php-cs-fixer: docker exec -e PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 php-cs-fixer.phar fix src
scripts.lint:php-cs-fixer:dry: docker exec -e PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 php-cs-fixer.phar fix src --dry-run -v --diff
scripts.lint:phpcbf: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpcbf.phar -d memory_limit=-1 --report=diff -p --extensions=php --standard=phpcs.xml
scripts.lint:phpcs: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpcs.phar --report=full --extensions=php src --standard=phpcs.xml
scripts.lint:phpcs:error: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpcs.phar  --report=full --extensions=php --warning-severity=0 --standard=phpcs.xml
scripts.lint:phpcs:warning: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpcs.phar --report=full --extensions=php --error-severity=0 --standard=phpcs.xml
scripts.lint:phpdoc: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phpDocumentor.phar -d src -t public/docs
scripts.lint:phploc: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 phploc.phar src
scripts.lint:phpmd: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 -d error_reporting=24575 phpmd.phar src,features/bootstrap ansi phpmd.xml
scripts.lint:phpmnd: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer run phpmnd
scripts.lint:phpstan:0: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 0
scripts.lint:phpstan:1: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 1
scripts.lint:phpstan:2: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 2
scripts.lint:phpstan:3: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 3
scripts.lint:phpstan:4: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 4
scripts.lint:phpstan:5: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 5
scripts.lint:phpstan:6: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 6
scripts.lint:phpstan:7: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 7
scripts.lint:phpstan:8: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 8
scripts.lint:phpstan:9: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) bin/phpstan analyse -l 9
scripts.lint:twig: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console lint:twig templates
scripts.lint:yaml: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console lint:yaml config translations --parse-tags
scripts.messenger:consume: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console messenger:consume async -vv
scripts.rector: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer run rector
scripts.rector:dry: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer run rector-dry
scripts.test:behat: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) php -d memory_limit=-1 behat.phar --config behat.yaml
scripts.test:phpunit: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer run simple-phpunit
scripts.test:phpunit:unit-integration: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony composer run simple-phpunit-unit-integration
scripts.translation:update: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console translation:update --force --format=yaml --clean fr
scripts.workflow:dump: docker exec -i $(npx korojscommands docker_getname-container --container phpfpm) symfony console workflow:dump
